data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bojková, Jindřiška, Soldán, Tomáš (2015): Two new species of the genus Prosopistoma (Ephemeroptera: Prosopistomatidae) from Iraq and Algeria. Zootaxa 4018 (1): 109-123, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4018.1.6
